column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////this was the worst tapas place i have ever been to in my life. the empanadas were greasy
column3: and i'm pretty sure i tasted newspaper. the croquetas were the same deal
column5: and the only thing good was desert because how can you mess up ice cream? if you want good tapas skip this place
column6: head to cafe iberico. this place is so awful.
